sections.title: Are you, or your family, carrying more than £10,000 total in cash into or out of the UK?

fields.label: Are you, or your family, carrying more than £10,000 total in cash into or out of the UK?
fields.helpText: This includes notes and coins, bankers drafts, cheques and travellers cheques, and in any currency equal to £10,000

fields.label: cashWarning
fields.infoText: You could face a penalty of up to £5,000 if you do not declare your cash or give incorrect information.

sections.title: You do not need to make a cash declaration

fields.infoText: You told us that the cash you are carrying (including currency notes, travellers cheques and bankers drafts) totals less than £10,000

Passport details

fields.label: Are you travelling into the UK by air or by sea?

fields.label: Are you travelling out of the UK by air or by sea?
optionHelpText: This is via ferry ports, for example

sections.title: Did you change at another airport, port or station?

fields.label: Did you change at another airport, port or station?
fields.helpText: If you changed to another plane, boat or train on your way to the UK, select yes. For example, if you flew into France and then took the Channel Tunnel to the UK.

sections.title: How many other airports, ports or stations did you travel via?

fields.label: How many other airports, ports or stations did you travel via?

sections.title: Details of change $n

fields.label: Name of airport, port or station

sections.title: Where did you make this declaration?
sections.description: This is your UK entry or exit point

fields.label: Name of airport, port, or station

sections.title: Are you carrying more than 5 different currencies

fields.label: Are you carrying more than 5 different currencies
fields.helpText: For more than 5 currencies you will need to enter the 5 largest amounts of different currencies and upload a document containing the remaining
optionHelpText: On the next 5 pages you will be asked to enter the 5 largest amounts of different currencies and then upload a document containing the remaining

sections.title: How many different currencies are you carrying?

fields.label: How many different currencies are you carrying?
fields.helpText: Only a maximum of 5 can be entered. For example euros, GBP, USD

sections.title: Currency $n
Main currency $n
sections.description: Enter details of the 5 main currencies on this and the following pages

sections.title: Upload details of the remaining currencies

fields.infoText:
The document should include all of the currencies you are carrying including:
* Name of currency
* Total amount in notes/coins
* Total amount in travellers cheques
* Total amount in bankers drafts

We accept insert file and format type here.

sections.title: Does the cash belong to you?

fields.label: Does the cash belong to you?
fields.helpText: If you own the largest amount, select yes

sections.title: Details of main cash owner
sections.description: If there are multiple cash owners, provide details of the person who owns the largest amount

sections.title: Cash details
sections.description: Provide details of where the cash comes from

fields.label: Cash origin
fields.helpText: For example, sale of a property, personal savings or business takings

sections.title: Are you intending to give the cash to someone else?

fields.label: Are you intending to give the cash to someone else?

sections.title: Person receiving the cash

fields.label: Full name
fields.helpText: If more than one person will receive the cash, enter the name of the person receiving the largest amount

sections.title: What will the cash be used for?

fields.label: What will the cash be used for?
fields.helpText: For example, buying a car, going on holiday or running a business

sections.title: Declaration

choices: I declare that all the details entered are correct and complete to the best of my knowledge and belief

fields.label: Email address
fields.helpText: We will only use this to send a confirmation that we have received your application. This will include your submission reference number, which you need to save.

fields.label: decInfo
fields.infoText:
By submitting below, you confirm that:

* you are carrying £10,000 or more into or out of the UK

You need to save a copy of this form now, so you can show it to customs officers if they ask.

Make a note of your submission reference number, which confirms you have made a declaration.

This is your last opportunity to print or save a pdf copy of your submitted form.
